DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia . The aim trial assess incidence rate type SADRs ( serious adverse drug reaction ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Safety Effectiveness Liraglutide Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Subjects type 2 diabetes mellitus , include newlydiagnosed subject , require treatment liraglutide Subjects previously liraglutide Subjects previously enrol study Subjects hypersensitivity liraglutide excipients Subjects pregnant , breast feeding intention become pregnant within study period Subjects cancer ( except basal cell skin cancer squamous cell skin cancer ) clinically significant disorder , except condition associate type 2 diabetes mellitus history physician ' opinion could interfere result trial Known suspect abuse alcohol narcotic
